abstract: iSlate has plenty of hype, but that name … hmmmm.
snippet: iSlate has plenty of hype, but that name … hmmmm.
lead_paragraph: In among all the speculation about the tablet that seems to be forthcoming from Apple and whether it will be a boon or a gallows for MSM, the name is getting a pretty good work-out. Some have noted that Apple seems to have its leopard paws on iSlate, but reader Patrick J. Shields is underwhelmed and suggested iTab had a nice ring to it. Maybe it’s time to help Apple and see if we can come up with a name. A few suggestions:
